Description: We are hiring a Senior ELV Sales & Technical Manager for one of our clients in Doha.Candidates who have the required qualifications and good experience may apply.Skills
Skills:
Minimum 5-10 years of experience in sales activities in ELV Systems including Fire alarm\Central battery\Voice Evacuation\VESDA\Third party Detection systems/FM200 systems/CCTV & ICT Systems and products.
Product sales experience in Fire Alarm & CCTV products.
Experience in Oil and Gas industries projects.
Familiar with the NFPA code for life safety.
Good communication skills.
A bachelor's degree in Electronics/Electrical Engineering.
Arabic nationality
Age: 30 and above.
With a transferable visa and valid QID/NOC
Residing in Qatar
